job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We have an exciting new job opening for a Generative AI Scientist in our Rapid Response Team. We are looking for a creative candidate who thrives on curiosity and learning, who has a passion to innovate, and enjoys a challenge. If you are that kind of scientist consider joining our team of thinkers and doers to drive innovation at the intersection of discovery and action!

   This position is in our Eindhoven-based Rapid Response Team (RRT), part of the Data and AI group at Thermo Fisher Scientific. The RRT is a multidisciplinary team focused on unlocking Generative AI's potential for customer products and R&D processes. The team moves quickly, progressing from ideation to proof of concept within four weeks.

   As a creative force in the RRT, you'll explore and showcase new GenAI technologies for future products and processes. Your role involves iterating on prototypes, validating assumptions, and preparing demos and reports. You'll collaborate with AI specialists, marketing, IT & SW Digital specialists, and partner teams, sharing results and insights across the organization., * Develop and propose compelling proof-of-concepts for application of generative AI in customer products or R&D process improvements.
     * Keep up to date with the latest advancements in the field of Generative AI and disseminate that learning in the team.
     * Collaborate closely with the AI teams across Thermo Fisher Scientific to define and integrate next generation AI methods into our customers products.
     * Drive patent generation in your field of expertise.
job_details.full_text:
Engineer III, Artificial Intelligence

We have an exciting new job opening for a Generative AI Scientist in our Rapid Response Team. We are looking for a creative candidate who thrives on curiosity and learning, who has a passion to innovate, and enjoys a challenge. If you are that kind of scientist consider joining our team of thinkers and doers to drive innovation at the intersection of discovery and action!

   This position is in our Eindhoven-based Rapid Response Team (RRT), part of the Data and AI group at Thermo Fisher Scientific. The RRT is a multidisciplinary team focused on unlocking Generative AI's potential for customer products and R&D processes. The team moves quickly, progressing from ideation to proof of concept within four weeks.

   As a creative force in the RRT, you'll explore and showcase new GenAI technologies for future products and processes. Your role involves iterating on prototypes, validating assumptions, and preparing demos and reports. You'll collaborate with AI specialists, marketing, IT & SW Digital specialists, and partner teams, sharing results and insights across the organization., * Develop and propose compelling proof-of-concepts for application of generative AI in customer products or R&D process improvements.
     * Keep up to date with the latest advancements in the field of Generative AI and disseminate that learning in the team.
     * Collaborate closely with the AI teams across Thermo Fisher Scientific to define and integrate next generation AI methods into our customers products.
     * Drive patent generation in your field of expertise.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes Generative AI technologies, including developing proof-of-concepts, exploring new GenAI technologies, and integrating next-generation AI methods. The core responsibilities align with building and showcasing applications of generative AI, fitting the definition of a GenAI Engineer.

phrases.phrase: unlocking Generative AI's potential for customer products and R&D processes
phrases.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of how AI can be applied to business objectives (customer products, R&D processes).

phrases.phrase: Develop and propose compelling proof-of-concepts for application of generative AI in customer products or R&D process improvements.
phrases.justification: This task requires understanding business needs to propose relevant AI solutions.

phrases.phrase: Generative AI Scientist
phrases.justification: The title itself implies a focus on generative modeling.

phrases.phrase: Generative AI
phrases.justification: Directly refers to the domain of generative models.

phrases.phrase: explore and showcase new GenAI technologies
phrases.justification: Involves understanding and working with generative AI models and techniques.

phrases.phrase: Keep up to date with the latest advancements in the field of Generative AI
phrases.justification: Requires knowledge of current generative AI models and techniques.

phrases.phrase: define and integrate next generation AI methods
phrases.justification: Implies working with and potentially adapting or applying advanced AI models.

phrases.phrase: iterating on prototypes
phrases.justification: Prototyping involves building functional pieces of software to demonstrate concepts.

phrases.phrase: preparing demos
phrases.justification: Demos require building functional applications or interfaces to showcase capabilities.

phrases.phrase: integrate next generation AI methods into our customers products
phrases.justification: This involves embedding AI capabilities into existing or new software products.

phrases.phrase: progressing from ideation to proof of concept within four weeks
phrases.justification: This rapid iteration cycle suggests a need for efficient development and deployment processes, which are core to MLOps.

phrases.phrase: thrives on curiosity and learning
phrases.justification: Directly states a requirement for continuous learning and curiosity.

phrases.phrase: Keep up to date with the latest advancements in the field of Generative AI
phrases.justification: Requires staying current with a rapidly evolving field.

phrases.phrase: passion to innovate
phrases.justification: Highlights a drive for creating new solutions and ideas.

phrases.phrase: creative force
phrases.justification: Indicates a role that requires creativity and initiative.

phrases.phrase: Drive patent generation in your field of expertise.
phrases.justification: Suggests taking ownership and initiative to protect intellectual property.

phrases.phrase: Collaborate closely with the AI teams across Thermo Fisher Scientific
phrases.justification: Requires working effectively with other teams.

phrases.phrase: sharing results and insights across the organization
phrases.justification: Involves communicating findings to a broader audience.

phrases.phrase: Collaborate with AI specialists, marketing, IT & SW Digital specialists, and partner teams
phrases.justification: Indicates a need to work with diverse groups of people.

phrases.phrase: enjoys a challenge
phrases.justification: Suggests a willingness to tackle difficult problems.

phrases.phrase: iterating on prototypes, validating assumptions
phrases.justification: This process involves problem-solving and testing hypotheses.
